backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing access-controlled user profiles, class and student management, and attendance tracking with role checks for teachers and parents.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend source files across routing, auth, UI, and dashboard pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining theme variables, color tokens, and dark mode settings.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration mapping all app pages and role-protected routes, wrapped with AuthProvider and UI toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout with header, nav links, user dropdown, and footer wrapping all routed pages.
frontend/src/components/RoleRouteGuard.t: Route guard enforcing authentication and role-based access, redirecting unauthorized users accordingly.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Provides auth state and actions using Internet Identity and localStorage, loading and storing user profiles. Manages login/logout logic and exposes authentication status via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, initializing access control and refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity initialization, login, logout, and state management using AuthClient, exposing identity and login status via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for profiles, classes, students, and attendance, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/polling.ts: Exports a constant polling interval of 10 seconds.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides simple validation functions for phone numbers and passwords.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Renders an access denied message with navigation buttons for home and login pages.
Parent login form using Internet Identity and profile validation to authenticate and redirect to the parent dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/auth/ParentSignUpPage: Parent signup form that validates input, saves a new profile, logs the user in, and redirects to the parent dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/auth/TeacherLoginPage: Teacher login page handling Internet Identity auth, profile checks, and navigation to the teacher dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/auth/TeacherSignUpPag: Teacher signup form that validates user data, creates a teacher profile, logs in, and redirects to the teacher dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the app's marketing landing page with hero image, feature highlights, and teacher/parent signup and login links.
frontend/src/pages/parent/ParentDashboar: Dashboard for parents showing linked students and attendance metrics with student selection and history polling.
frontend/src/pages/teacher/ClassDetailPa: Displays class details, lists students, and provides a dialog form to add new students via API hooks.
frontend/src/pages/teacher/TakeAttendanc: Loads class students, allows selecting a date, marking attendance, and submitting it using attendance API hooks.
frontend/src/pages/teacher/TeacherDashbo: Shows teacher classes, summary stats, and includes a dialog to create new classes through API hooks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, store, and clear URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback and hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and core plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing ATTENDEASE features, requirements, architecture notes, and current implemented features.
